Subject: Your offer sounds good

So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Daniel Frades

Date: Saturday, 3/1/1987
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B Pete Ward, SP Werner Penaflor, MR Anthony Fenderson
in return for
2B Curtis Arispe.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Bay City GM



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Progress of Dave Quirk
Dear Sir,
Dave Quirk has an ERA of 3.89 at A Peoria Chiefs!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Status of Freddy Lozano
Dear Sir,
Freddy Lozano shouldn't play at AA Springfield Duff!
He has an AVG of .234 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
